articles.title: The pandemic won't fix the climate crisis. This $3 trillion recovery plan could
articles.description: Can the global economy and environment be rescued at the same time? The answer is yes, according to the International Energy Agency, which is calling on governments to invest $3 trillion in a green recovery from the coronavirus pandemic.

articles.title: Qantas cancels international flights until October. New Zealand may be the exception
articles.description: Australian flagship carrier Qantas has canceled most of its international flights for the next four months on the expectation that the coronavirus pandemic will last through most of the year.

articles.author: Samantha Tapfumaneyi, Sarah Dean, Emma Reynolds and Hilary Clarke, CNN
articles.title: British singer Vera Lynn dies aged 103
articles.description: British singer Vera Lynn, whose sentimental ballads during World War II provided the soundtrack for the Allied war effort, has died at the age of 103, according to a statement from the Dame Vera Lynn Children's Charity on Thursday.

articles.title: A border dispute with China may push India closer to some of Beijing's top rivals
